author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district police claimed to have made a breakthrough in a robbery case that occurred at Madathukulam in November 2015 in which one kg of gold, three mobile phones and cash were taken away from a bus passenger by 10 persons.

Main accused

Police sources said the main accused in the case, S. Mukesh (30) of Palakkad, was arrested on Tuesday night.

Other members of the gang were still at large.

The gang , who came by car, intercepted the bus near Madathukulam and then robbed the valuables at knife point from B. Thirunavukkarasu, who worked in jewellery in Madurai, the police officials said.
title: Man arrested in robbery case
